text:
[Verse]
Sunflowers in the city
Shining so pretty
Yellow and bright
Dancing in the light

[Verse 2]
Streets full of grace
People find their place
Colors everywhere
Joy’s in the air

[Chorus]
Sunflowers oh they sway
Brighten up the day
City feels alive
Watch the spirits rise

[Verse 3]
Kids play in the park
Laughter after dark
Petals in the breeze
Everyone at ease

[Chorus]
Sunflowers oh they sway
Brighten up the day
City feels alive
Watch the spirits rise

[Bridge]
Lay down on the grass
Time will slowly pass
Simple little truth
Found in the youth
title: Sunflowers in the City
